name: VKT Prime System Crash (itch) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
name_original: VKT Prime System Crash (itch) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
Alice Lorange, Alt.Lorange, Alex, Denis, Nuri, Taralise and Chiko…

They aren’t from the same worlds and, yet, they have the occasion to talk to each other, when they ended up captured...

A short story written in Ren’Py, staring characters from Mia’s previous works, with fake engine crashes and QTEs! Bilingual UI.
